channel.title: Unsigned
channel.description:
Every time I try to load a signed java applet, it says:
The code cannot be verified by a trusted source. Code will be treated as unsigned. Name: (Insert applet name here) java.ioEOFFEXCEPTION
It says this on every single signed applet I try to run. How do I fix this If you can't solve it, please get someone else. Don't give up and only solve the idiotic simple questions.

item.title: Unsigned
item.dc:creator: @Zillionair1 Zillionair1
item.description:
@Zillionair1 wrote:

You mean 1.6.0_13 and I did do that. FAILURE =(

Read full topic

item.title: Unsigned
item.dc:creator: @x_power_x x power x
item.description:
@x_power_x wrote:

Try contacting your ISP. ( internet service provider ), or someone with knowledge of the computer. Look @ the restrictions for your computer and it might block particular JAVA sun applets. If that doesnt work, try un-installing your current JDK, and re-installing the new, recommended JAVA JDK version (1.6.0_12)

Read full topic
